snippet: A decision on the Affordable Care Act that could affect 36 states increases the likelihood of a Supreme Court ruling.
abstract: Federal Judge Ronald A White deals blow to Affordable Care Act, ruling that the federal government cannot subsidize health insurance in three dozen states that refused to establish their own marketplaces.
lead_paragraph: A decision on the Affordable Care Act that could affect 36 states increases the likelihood of a Supreme Court ruling.

headline.main: U.S. Cannot Subsidize Health Plans in States With No Marketplace, a Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: U.S. Cannot Subsidize Health Plans in States With No Marketplace, a Judge Rules

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
